title: Zettai Shougeki: Platonic Heart
original_name: 絶対衝激～プラトニックハート～
opening_song: "Tatsumaki Wave (タツマキ WAVE)" by Little Non
sinopse: The story centers on the Platonic Heart, a jewel that—according to an old urban legend—can grant any wish when collected. Only a chosen few are allowed to compete in the Platonic Heart hunt, and high school junior Aya Iseshima is one of 11 girls and women who are taking part.
